format: This data frame contains the following columns:

parameters.area: a numeric vector giving the floor area
parameters.sale.price:
a numeric vector giving the sale price
in thousands of Australian dollars
parameters.bedrooms: a numeric vector giving the number of bedrooms

title: Aranda House Prices
description:
Description
The houseprices data frame consists of the floor
area, price, and the number
of bedrooms for a sample of houses sold in Aranda in 1999. 
Aranda is a suburb of Canberra, Australia.
